title: Hello to Dr. Steve!
html: Heh, heh - looks like I got a response from Dr. Steve to my mini-review of The Radio Adventures of Doctor Floyd. Very cool - and, of course, I only listen to cheer for the masterminded schemes of Dr. Steve. Oh, and to try to figure out what Fidgert's saying.
body: Heh, heh - looks like I got a response from Dr. Steve to my mini-review of The Radio Adventures of Doctor Floyd. Very cool - and, of course, I only listen to cheer for the masterminded schemes of Dr. Steve. Oh, and to try to figure out what Fidgert's saying.
